Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "As you can see through the porthole, we're close to the mission location."}
{2: 'Gazing out.', 3: '4'}
{1: '1', 3: "It's an island."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Technically, a corner of an island.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'An enormous white tower stands on the cape, casting a long shadow on the surface of the sea.'}
{2: 'Is this the "Towerfolk"?', 3: '8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "It may be called a tower, but it's actually a deep-space rocket that never got launched.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Just one of the many things that got disrupted by the virus.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'The liaison will fill you in on the specifics.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Hold on tight. Landing on a makeshift airstrip can be a little rough!'}
{3: 'As you descend from the aircraft, the giant tower, which looked like a white column from up in the air, becomes an imposing colossus.'}
{3: 'Despite the wear and tear on the surface of the tower, the blue logo and the four letters "AAXA" are clear as day.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is the "Utopia-65000" model... built by the AAXA (Asian Astronomical Study Assembly).', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I never imagined I'd see it with my own eyes... It's enormous...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You enter a dilapidated building that harks back to the Golden Age.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The hallway and lobby are filled with tents and makeshift structures that look at odds with the simplicity of the building housing them.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Uh, Miss Celica should have already told you. I'm Sagawa! The liaison for the Towerfolk!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: 'As you can see, we live close to the white tower and we rely on the electricity it generates. That\'s why we call ourselves "Towerfolk"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Sagawa, we have a situation!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: 'What is it, Fujiko?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fujiko', 3: 'Komori and her recovery team still haven\'t come back! They must have run into "those people" again!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "Oh, that's not good... I know this is a bit sudden, but we need your help!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A little more detail, please.', 3: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "Yeah, yeah! Sorry, stupid me! Here's what happened...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: 'Get to the stranded recovery team as fast as you can and bring them back, and then...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "(Whispers) Perhaps I need to force my dad's hand this time...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: 'Oh, never mind! That was an unrelated matter. Off you go then!', 4: '1'}
